name: RepairOrder1
description: Represents the current and past repairs or services that the customer has had. This is the first order.

sampleUtterances.utterance: Can you show the first repair order?
What is my first repair order?

plainTextMessage.value: To check for line items please type "Line Item 1."
The current status of your repair order is "OPEN," meaning the car is currently being worked on. Would you like to check for opening/closing date and time? (Yes/No)
Open Date/Time - September 17, 2021 at 4:00 pm. I'll notify you when the order is complete. To check for line items please type "Line Item 1."
